channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Fashion
channel.desc: Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: MarlaWynne Fashion
channel.desc: Easy care, easy wear, easy elegance in this mix and match collection of unique and versatile pieces created for the smart, elegant, busy women seeking comfort that doesn't compromise style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: New Season Seasalt Cornwall
channel.desc: New Season Seasalt Cornwall.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.title: Best of QVC Style

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Hayloft Plants
channel.desc: Discover an exciting range or rare, unusual, exciting, and most of all beautiful plants that will bring an abundance of charm and colour to your outdoor space.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: In the Garden with Thompson & Morgan
channel.desc: Enjoy gorgeous plants and flowers in your garden from Thompson & Morgan, one of the UK's oldest horticulture firms and an established household name for gardeners across the country.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Discover Apricot fashion, showcasing chic wardrobe staples and elegant pieces to bring your style to life. From fabulous prints to bold pops of colours, discover how you can enliven your look today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Buildcraft
channel.desc: Save up to 50% on Buildcraft! Discover fantastic deals on quality tools and essentials to help you tackle your next DIY project with confidence.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: YouGarden
channel.desc: Discover beautiful plants and all the garden essentials you need, from You Garden.
